all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And now, behold, whosoever is of my church, and endureth of my church to the end, him will I establish upon my rock, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against them.
Doctrine and Covenants 10:69
Quote of the Day
"We must stop looking for reasons to divide and instead seek opportunities to “be one.”"
David L. Buckner | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
